definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Polyurethane elastomer systems for solvent-free spray-up were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 製備了無溶劑噴塗成型聚氨酯彈性體體系。

sentences.english: The one-component waterborne is classified into two systems, linear and crosslinking systems.
sentences.chinese: 單組分水性聚氨酯主要包括線型和交聯型二種。

sentences.english: Best result are obtained by shutting down on a non-TPU resin like polyethylene.
sentences.chinese: 最好的結果是停止使用非聚氨酯樹脂，如聚乙烯。

sentences.english: PU-coated leather provides durability and easy care.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯塗層皮革提供耐用性。

sentences.english: Polyesters exhibit better non-yellowing properties than epoxies, but not as good as aliphatic urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯的耐黃性優於環氧樹脂，但弱於脂肪族聚氨酯。

sentences.english: PUA has good wear resistance and flexibility advantages.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯丙烯酸酯具有耐磨性好，柔韌性好的優點。

sentences.english: Hand-painted polyurethane outsole ensures lightweight durability and flexible walking.
sentences.chinese: 手繪聚氨酯大底，確保輕便耐用性和靈活行走。

sentences.english: Removable PU foam insole may help accommodate a personal orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸的聚氨酯泡沫鞋墊可以幫助容納個人的矯正。

sentences.english: The base of braiding machine bobbin carriers is molded of an elastomer, polyurethane.
sentences.chinese: 在編織機筒管運營基地是硅酮彈性體，聚氨酯。

sentences.english: Design of mold and research of process for polyurethane elastomer for oil seal are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹聚氨酯彈性體油封的注射模具的設計及工藝研究。

sentences.english: Gives the viscosity control method of polyurethane prepolymer preparation.
sentences.chinese: 給出了聚氨酯預聚物合成的粘度控制方法。

sentences.english: But it is no obvious improvement in water resistance of water-borne polyurethane.
sentences.chinese: 但單純的水性聚氨酯的耐水性還不夠理想。

sentences.english: The resistance to water infiltration of the two coatings was evaluated using EIS.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯面漆的抗滲水性能強於丙烯酸磁漆。

sentences.english: In this study, the synthetic technology of different polyurethane prepolymers was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了聚氨酯預聚體的合成工藝。
具有彈性體性質的聚氨酯。

sentences.english: Polyesters are less brittle than epoxies, but not as flexible or tough as urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯沒有環氧樹脂發脆，但也沒有聚氨酯的堅韌性。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
